# Overview

datosmadrid helps you search the Madrid Open Data catalogue and call its public API from R.

```{r}
library(datosmadrid)
```

# Search the catalogue

Find datasets by keyword.
```{r}
res <- search_datasets("bici", page_limit = 1, n_max = 20)
res
```

Pick a dataset to explore:
```{r}
ds <- res$title[1]
link <- res$url[1]  # if you return urls; otherwise construct manually
link
```
